mapper.sql: select b.borrow_id, b.borrow_no, b.item_id, b.item_code, b.item_name, c.category_name, b.borrower_id, COALESCE(b.borrower_name, u.nick_name, u.user_name) as borrower_name, b.borrower_dept, d.dept_name as borrower_dept_name, b.quantity, b.borrow_time, b.expected_return, b.actual_return, b.return_quantity, b.status, b.approver_id, b.approver_name, b.approve_time, b.purpose, b.create_by, b.create_time, b.update_by, b.update_time, b.remark, b.reserve_status, b.reserve_start_date, b.reserve_end_date from inv_borrow b left join inv_item i on b.item_id = i.item_id left join inv_category c on i.category_id = c.category_id left join sys_dept d on b.borrower_dept = d.dept_id left join sys_user u on b.borrower_id = u.user_id
mapper.select:
and b.borrow_no like concat('%', #{borrowNo}, '%') and b.item_name like concat('%', #{itemName}, '%') and b.borrower_id = #{borrowerId} and (b.borrower_name like concat('%', #{borrowerName}, '%') OR u.nick_name like concat('%', #{borrowerName}, '%') OR u.user_name like concat('%', #{borrowerName}, '%'))

and date_format(b.actual_return,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endActualReturn},'%Y%m%d')
order by b.create_time desc
